page.title: 11GAMES WE PLAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: The games I enjoy playing in school at playtimes are netball, skipping & football. I think these games are good fun. We have a netball pitch and a football pitch marked out on two of the four school fields. One day we play football and the next we play net ball. The boys are practising for the Rural Schools Tournament at Bells Sports Centre in Perth & we practice for the Netball Tournament but at school we play together and against each other for practice. In netball there are 7 players in each team but in football you can either have 5 or 11 players. It is 5 a side football that we play. I also enjoy skipping, I can skip forwards and backwards.I like skipping when two people hold the ends of the rope and turn it while a line of us skip 2 and out building up to 10 and out,when only 2 could still be in.
